long_description: You can store two bikes vertically without drilling holes into your ceiling or floors with the Topeak B2 Bike Stand. Lightweight aluminum tube with quick-release locking mechanism mounts anywhere without drilling holes into your ceiling or floors. Aluminum tube extends up to a height of 10' 7.8'' (320cm). Comes with two bike mounts that adjust quickly and securely, and can adjust 30deg from horizontal.
short_description: You can store two bikes vertically without drilling holes into your ceiling or floors with the Topeak B2 Bike Stand.
